description: Try our easy to follow Lentils With Artichokes & Capsicums recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lentils With Artichokes & Capsicums Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 handful fresh flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Put the lentils, artichokes, capsicums, herbs, and spring onions in a large bowl. Drizzle over the oil and vinegar, season with salt and black pepper, and stir well to combine.
Add the Parma ham and rocket, and toss gently. Transfer to a serving dish, and serve with a green salad.
